googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Traelyn Miller
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Would NOT recommend in the event of an emergency. City shut off gas. Adidas seemed legit when scheduling appointment but ghosted me afterwards. No response after scheduling or next day.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: JourneyMan
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I tried to use this business.  They said they would come at a specified time, and they were a no show.  Called back, and they apologized, sating they would have been here this afternoon.  Gave them another 3 minutes and gave them another call for a status update.  Went to VM.  Sent a text message, yet no response. In short, call someone else if you want someone to show up.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Spencer Sanders
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Made an appointment a week in advance and got a no call no show. I know things happen so I gave them 30 minutes before I called. He said let me see where my tech is and i'll call you back. Still waiting on that phone call.... This wouldn't be a big deal but I had to take off work for the appointment. Went with another company and they were there the next day and on time.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Amey Key
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Adidas was amazing. He went the extra mile to make sure my plumbing to my pedicure chair was installed properly and working. I will definitely use for future plumbing jobs.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Ben Davis
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
Professsional demeanor and clean professional work.
💯/A+
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Al Henson
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Mr Buyers...My time is valuable as is yours.  U make an appointment for 8 am and show up on my door at 2:30 pm. I saw u from my alarm system. U didn't have the decency to call and OBTW, u couldn't reply to my txt from 7 am to confirm if u were coming.  Piss poor way to conduct business!!!  Don't bother, someone who wants business will do my job.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Misty Ary
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I was very impressed with Adidas and his crew today. While it is early,  it appears that my problem has been fixed and for that I am very grateful. They were professional, thorough and cleaned up afterwards. Price was also reasonable. I would recommend this company!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: David Mundt
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I'm a huge fan of Byers Plumbing.  They've done both large and small plumbing jobs at my house and have been easy to contact, quick to respond, and really professional with their quality work.  Be sure to text them if unable to connect via voice.  Only plumbers I use.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Laura Mitchell
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I have had a lot of experience with people doing home repairs of all sorts. Unfortunately it's really hard to find someone that does honest and good work. I am so blessed to have found these guys! They are very knowledgeable and respond quickly. They fixed the last plumbers "repairs" and charged half the amount to do the same work. Only this time, it was actually repaired. They also did an excellent job with a more extensive plumbing issue for a great price. I believe I finally found a plumber I can trust. I highly recommend them!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jennifer Hannah
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: After struggling to find a plumber or even get one to call me back, someone recommended Byers Plumbing to me.  I called them in the morning, they were there in a couple of hours, and my problem was SOLVED by the afternoon!  The price was fair and I was very pleased with their work.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jennifer Hess
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Mr. Byers was on time, very friendly, and professional. He even came the same day that I called, which was a plus. He was able to fix my plumbing issue, and his rates are great. I would definitely call him again and I would recommended him to anyone.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Rachel Ellis Dean
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Byers Plumbing is by far the best plumbing service I've ever used.They are courteous, knowledgeable, licensed, prompt, tidy, hard working, highly professional, and more! If I ever need more plumbing works, Byers Plumbing is #1 on my list! Thank you for such a great job! I highly recommend Byers Plumbing for all your plumbing needs!!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Brad P
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: We had a great experience with Byers Plumbing! I called Byers to replace a water pressure regulator and they were able to come out the next day and get the job done. Adidas was personable, efficient with his time and got the job done at a reasonable cost. I definitely recommend them.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: breanna farmer
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I am a Realtor and often need estimates and repairs made for home buyers and sellers, and Adidas and his staff are the first ones I call when I have plumbing needs. Byers Plumbing is always reliable, responsive and reasonable. He not only does work for me in a professional manner, but also assists me with my personal home plumbing needs! I highly recommend Byers Plumbing!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Lisa Wester
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Working in the construction and design industry, I need subs that I can rely on. Byers Plumbing is at the top of my list. They are certified trade professionals who not only stand behind their work but have also been willing to work in emergency situations. Adidas and his team are honest and trustworthy and provide reasonable rates for their services. I highly recommend Byers Plumbing.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jennifer Guthery
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Very prompt and very professional!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Christy Blankenship
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: GREAT Quailty service!! Very professional and highly recommended!! Will definitely use them for any future plumbing needs!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Nadia Wilder
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Can't say enough good things about Mr. Byers!  Fast, friendly & honest service!  Offered a free estimate and answered all of the questions!  Highly recommend for your minor and major plumbing needs!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Nadia thanks for the great comments.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jennifer Umphrey
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I’m not one to leave a bad review but I paid him $300 dollars the problem wasn’t fixed made another appointment never showed then called a bunch no answer! now I can’t flush my toilet and take a 5 min shower and end up with water to my ankles I called the city to make sure about the problem it’s still on my end so Ima have to pay more money to get more work done!!! So $300 dollars just pissed away!!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Michael Williams
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: They do excellent work, thanks again guys!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Chasity Cook
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!! We contacted Mr. Byers early on a SUNDAY & he was there & had our water line fixed within an hour.  PHENOMENAL SERVICE & LOW PRICE!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Doug
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: These folks are courteous, fast, honest!! We called Tuesday, they were here early Wednesday. Without seeing the job they quoted me a price and held to it, I believe the job was more than they thought, but never did they complain, cracked jokes with us yes!! I like that!! I will call them again for any plumbing issues we may have!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Mike Sheheane
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I had a great experience with Byers plumbing. He came out fixed water heater, set a toilet - he does a great job very prompt- I am very pleased to recommend Byers because he is a great plumber and his prices are very fair- He is very prompt and takes care of the problem - I will always use him in the future.Thanks BYERS Plumbing for a job well done!!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Morgan A. Montiel
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: We have used Byers Plumbing twice and we are quite satisfied! Fast and curtious service. We had a shower fixture leak and it was quickly replaced and fixed. They are reasonable and professional!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Mook Swann
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Byers Plumbing does top of the line work. Byers Plumbing installed my hot water heater and remodeled my bathroom a few years ago. Byers Plumbing exceeded all my expectations. I am very pleased with the work that was provided. If I ever need any Plumbing related work done BYERS PLUMBING will be the first company I call. I give this company a 5-star rating.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: BETTY SUE Baker
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Finally....a plumber you can trust!!   First time customer...emergency situation....Awesome experience!!!   My husband was so impressed that we have contracted him to replace all the plumbing!!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Sherrie Hicks
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Very professional and prompt service! I would definitely recommend him! He came out on a Sunday and was very thorough.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: sarah l
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Great price and greater service! Mr. Byers has resolved several plumbing problems for me even in emergency situations. Responds quickly and does NOT over charge. I will be using him for anything plumbing related from this point forward. Friendly, up front, professional, and does not do anything sneaky like change prices half way through a project. Would highly recommend.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Tabitha Milam-Fisher
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I highly recommend Byers Plumbing for all of your plumbing needs!! They are very professional, respectful and dependable! Byers Plumbing is efficient, they take their time and do it right the first time, no matter how long it takes. And I can honestly say that their rates are the most reasonable I have found anywhere! Highly, highly recommend!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Eric Pope
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I highly recommend Byers for your plumbing needs.  He was on time and was very professional.  I will not use anyone else.. Exceptional service.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Andre Patterson
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: My water pressure dropped about 40 percent. They located the leak quickly and fixed it just as fast. Friendly, knowledgeable, and really great service.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Brandi Mandeville
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Had a huge leak in the toilet in our bathroom TWO days before I was to have a house full of guests for Thanksgiving. Called Byers Plumbing and they came out the same day and had me fixed fast! They didnt rip me off with the price either, and I've had bad experiences in the past with others. Great company, very friendly and professional.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: James Herring
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: He came out and diagnosed my water leak problem quickly and made the repair to my plumbing quickly and for an unbeatable price.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Byers Plumbing

plumberResearchFull.json:
### Business Information:

- **Alabama Business Registration/License Details:**
  - Byers Plumbing, LLC is registered with the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board, with a license number of MP-1796[1].
  - The business is incorporated as a Limited Liability Company (LLC) and was incorporated on October 25, 2016[1].

- **Physical Location and Service Areas:**
  - The physical location of Byers Plumbing is at 2700 Corporate Dr #200, Birmingham, AL 35242, although some sources list the address as 2328 Moody Pkwy, Moody, AL 35004, it appears the Birmingham address is the current or primary location[1][3].
  - The service area includes both residential and commercial clients in the Birmingham area[1][3].

- **Hours and Payment Methods:**
  - Hours of operation are Monday to Saturday from 9 AM to 5 PM. Saturday and Sunday services are available for emergencies only[1][3].
  - There is no specific information on payment methods, but it is common for plumbing services to accept various payment options including credit cards, checks, and cash.

- **Years in Operation:**
  - Byers Plumbing, LLC started its business on January 20, 2014, and has been in operation for approximately 11 years[1].

### Services & Specialties:

- **Types of Services Offered:**
  - Byers Plumbing offers a range of services including commercial and residential plumbing, sewer services, renovation and repair, leak detection, drain and sewer cleaning, and water heater installation and repair[1][3].

- **Service Areas Covered:**
  - The service area primarily includes the Birmingham, Alabama region, covering both residential and commercial clients[1][3].

- **Emergency Service Availability:**
  - Emergency plumbing services are available, with Saturday and Sunday services limited to emergencies only[1][3].

- **Listed Prices or Rates:**
  - There is no specific pricing listed for Byers Plumbing, but general plumbing rates can range from $45 to $165 per hour, depending on the service. Some services may be offered at fixed rates rather than hourly rates[2].

### Customer Reviews & Reputation:

- **Review Summaries with Specific Examples:**
  - Byers Plumbing has a rating of 4.4 based on 36 reviews. Positive feedback highlights the professionalism, quality of workmanship, and responsiveness of the service. Examples include:
    - "Adidas was amazing. He went the extra mile…"[3]
    - "Professional demeanor and clean professional work."[3]
    - "I am so blessed to have found these guys!"[3]
  - Negative feedback primarily revolves around issues with appointment scheduling and communication, such as missed appointments and lack of response[3].

- **BBB Rating and Status:**
  - Byers Plumbing is not a BBB Accredited Business but has a BBB rating of A+ based on the BBB's rating system. However, the business has some complaints regarding customer service and communication, which is reflected in a C- rating in some contexts[1][3].

- **Common Customer Feedback Themes:**
  - Positive themes include professionalism, effective problem-solving, courteous service, reasonable pricing, and thorough cleanup.
  - Negative themes include issues with appointment scheduling, communication difficulties, and no-shows[3].

- **Response to Reviews:**
  - There is no detailed information on how the business responds to reviews, but the mixed feedback suggests that while the business excels in many areas, it has room for improvement in customer service and communication[3].

### Owner & Staff:

- **Owner/Management Information:**
  - The owner of Byers Plumbing, LLC is Mr. Adidas Byers[1][3].

- **Staff Qualifications:**
  - There is no detailed information available on the specific qualifications of the staff, but the business is licensed by the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board, indicating that the staff meets the necessary professional standards[1].

- **Professional Certifications:**
  - The business holds a valid license from the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board, which is a professional certification required for plumbing services in Alabama[1].
aboutUs: Byers Plumbing is a trusted local plumbing company serving the Birmingham area with exceptional expertise. Our team of licensed professionals specializes in residential and commercial plumbing services, including sewer services, leak detection, drain cleaning, and water heater installation and repair. With a focus on quality workmanship and customer satisfaction, we are committed to providing reliable solutions for all your plumbing needs.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a licensed and insured plumbing company dedicated to delivering exceptional service.
sellingPoints: Prompt and reliable emergency plumbing services, available 24/7 for your urgent needs.
State-of-the-art equipment and techniques for accurate leak detection and efficient drain cleaning.
Comprehensive plumbing solutions, from routine maintenance to complex installations and renovations.
